title: Don't Miss Out on These Major October Prime Day Fashion Deals
description: ICYMI: the final day of Amazon's October Prime Day sale is happenig for just a few more hours, which means now's your last chance to stock up on some of Amazon's most coveted styles at a fraction of their usual cost. From cozy sweaters and staple winter coats to celebrity-loved UGG boots and editor-approved dupes, there's something for everyone to shop - and just in time for the upcoming holiday gifting season. Ahead, we narrowed down the best October Prime Day fashion deals from day two of the massive event, with savings from major fashion brands like Levi's, Adidas, and Ray-Ban, among many others. Our Favorite Amazon Prime Day Fashion Deals to Shop You need this in every color: Mangopop Square-Neck Bodysuit at $17, originally $36 Cozy leggings for the cozy season: Baleaf Fleece-Lined Leggings at $26, originally $50 The best deal on Ray-Ban Aviators: Ray-Ban Aviator Sunglasses at $184, originally $230 You'll never want to take this bra off: Calvin Klein Cotton Wireless Bralette at $18, originally $30 Keep scrolling to shop our top picks, and if you're looking for more sales, check out PS's editor-curated Amazon Prime Day deals list and subscribe to our newsletter for more shopping recommendations. Plus, be sure to sign up for Amazon Prime so that you don't miss a second of the action. Update on October 9, 2024 at 9:15PM ET: Updated prices and checked stock for all products. Related: 49 Prime Day Beauty Deals You Don't Want to Miss
author: Kyley Warren
excerpt: Shop the best October Prime Day fashion deals from Amazon, with savings across major brands like Levi's, Ray-Ban, Adidas, and more.
text: AmazonPhoto Illustration: Keila GonzalezAmazonPhoto Illustration: Keila GonzalezWhile each product featured is independently selected by our editors, we may include paid promotion. If you buy something through our links, we may earn commission. Read more about our Product Review Guidelines here.ICYMI: the final day of Amazon's October Prime Day sale is happenig for just a few more hours, which means now's your last chance to stock up on some of Amazon's most coveted styles at a fraction of their usual cost. From cozy sweaters and staple winter coats to celebrity-loved UGG boots and editor-approved dupes, there's something for everyone to shop — and just in time for the upcoming holiday gifting season. Ahead, we narrowed down the best October Prime Day fashion deals from day two of the massive event, with savings from major fashion brands like Levi's, Adidas, and Ray-Ban, among many others. Our Favorite Amazon Prime Day Fashion Deals to Shop You need this in every color: Mangopop Square-Neck Bodysuit at $17, originally $36 Cozy leggings for the cozy season: Baleaf Fleece-Lined Leggings at $26, originally $50 The best deal on Ray-Ban Aviators: Ray-Ban Aviator Sunglasses at $184, originally $230 You'll never want to take this bra off: Calvin Klein Cotton Wireless Bralette at $18, originally $30 Keep scrolling to shop our top picks, and if you're looking for more sales, check out PS's editor-curated Amazon Prime Day deals list and subscribe to our newsletter for more shopping recommendations. Plus, be sure to sign up for Amazon Prime so that you don't miss a second of the action. Update on October 9, 2024 at 9:15PM ET: Updated prices and checked stock for all products. amazon.comBest Amazon Prime Day Deals on Bestsellers14K Gold Hoop Earrings ($9, originally $12) With this earring set, you can upgrade your jewelry box on a budget. The bundle comes with six pairs of gold hoop earrings, all of which boast different shapes, sizes, and even textures. You can scoop it up for yourself or gift it to the fashion-lover in your life.amazon.comBest Amazon Prime Day Deals on BestsellersTelena Belt Bag ($10, originally $13) Found: the perfect bag for fall. This sporty accessory has developed a cult fan base thanks to its lightweight and practical design, which includes an adjustable strap and several zippered pockets. It's a perfect dupe for other luxe versions and comes in a variety of colorways, so you can shop out your dream style with ease. For the full product details, check out our review of the Telena Belt Bag. Editor Quote: "The bag comes with many of the same features as the original viral belt bag, including ample storage and water-resistant material. It has a main compartment and three mesh slots for keeping valuables secure, plus adjustable straps that allow you to wear it as a crossbody, a belt bag, or a fanny pack. It's available in a whopping 32 different colorways, along with sherpa, puffer, and quilted textures, but we especially love the pink and beige options." — Lauren Mazzo, former senior editor, FitnessPS Photography | Kyley WarrenBest Amazon Prime Day Deals on BestsellersMangopop Square Neck Bodysuit ($17, originally $36) Get back to the basics with this bestselling Amazon bodysuit — aka the ultimate wardrobe essential. This is a piece with so much styling versatility; you can wear it on its own, pair it with a blazer and jeans, or even a high-waisted skirt and boots for the breeziest fall 'fit. See how one editor styled the bodysuit in our review of Amazon's bestselling bodysuits. Editor Quote: "The elasticity is flawless and makes for the most perfect fit. It's tight and form-fitting but hugs in all the right places. I love the square neckline, and the long sleeves make it the perfect pairing with jeans for fall. This bodysuit looks extremely similar to a bodysuit I've been eyeing that costs over $100, which makes me so happy I stumbled across this one because it's a fraction of the price." — Renee Rodriguez, staff writer and social produceramazon.comBest Amazon Prime Day Deals on BestsellersBeaully Flannel Plaid Shacket ($28, originally $46) When the outside temperatures are too cold for a light knit, but still too warm for a heavy jacket, opt for a transitional piece like this stylish shacket. The layer combines the cozy feel of a classic jacket with the lightweight nature of a button-down, creating a versatile piece you can comfortably wear all season long. Plus, nothing says autumn quite like a new flannel. PS Photography | Marisa PetrarcaBest Amazon Prime Day Deals on BestsellersLevi's Ribcage Straight Ankle Jeans ($31, originally $80) You can never have too many pairs of jeans, and this Levi's style comes highly recommended — by Amazon shoppers and PS editors alike. The bottom's high-rise silhouette delivers a universally flattering fit that's designed to look good on a range of body types. Plus, it's breathable with semi-stretch, so you can move around with ease. Read through our Levi's Ribcage Straight Ankle Jeans review to learn more. Editor Quote: "The Levi's Ribcage Straight Ankle Jeans are best for those looking for straight-leg denim that fuses comfort with classic style. While they're not cheap, Levi's is a reliable brand that prioritizes durability, so you can rest assured that they'll last you a long time. They're a great pair of jeans to add to your capsule collection." — Marisa Petrarca, contributing editor, Shoppingamazon.comBest Amazon Prime Day Deals on BestsellersKoolaburra by UGG Victoria Mini Fashion Boot ($80, originally $90) If you've been looking for an excuse to splurge on a new pair of UGG boots, look no further than this cropped style — which is currently on sale at October Prime Day. The mini boot is wrapped in the coziest suede material that's easy to keep clean, with a decorative faux-fur accent that helps it to stand out. amazon.comBest Amazon Prime Day Deals on Tops and SweatersTrendy Queen Off-the-Shoulder Top ($15, originally $20) The asymmetrical top trend is here to stay, and with this sleek option, you can embrace the lopsided fad without having to break the bank. Pair it with high-waisted jeans and statement booties for the ultimate summer-to-fall look.amazon.comBest Amazon Prime Day Deals on Tops and SweatersAnrabess Oversized Crewneck Sweater ($30, originally $40) There are cute fall sweaters, and then there's this chunky Amazon crewneck. From the oversize silhouette and cuffed sleeves to its cozy camel coloring and flattering design, there's so much to love about this cozy piece — including that discounted price tag.amazon.comBest Amazon Prime Day Deals on Dresses and Matching SetsQinsen Spaghetti Strap Tennis Dress ($31, originally $37) Tap into the tenniscore trend with an athletic dress you can comfortably wear for your next workout or sweat sesh. The lightweight style is made from a nylon and elastane material that's sleek and moisture-wicking, so you won't have to worry about awkward sweat stains.amazon.comBest Amazon Prime Day Deals on Dresses and Matching SetsAnrabess Oversized Sweater Dress ($34, originally $63) What better way to welcome cozy season than with a new sweater dress you'll want to snuggle up in all season long? This ribbed style has an oversize design that creates a more lived-in feel, making it perfect for all-day lounging or any occasion where you want to prioritize comfort. We love the styling versatility of this white shade, but the fall dress is also available in 17 other colors.amazon.comBest Amazon Prime Day Deals on Dresses and Matching SetsAnrabess 2-Piece Sweatsuit ($37, originally $50) Slip into something a little more comfortable (and cohesive) with this matching sweatsuit from Amazon. The cozy bundle includes an oversize sweatshirt with adjustable sweatpants to match. You can wear the ensemble while lounging around at home, grabbing groceries, or even a quick bite to eat. It has a knit composition that's endlessly comfy, with extra stretch at the waist for easier movement.amazon.comBest Amazon Prime Day Deals on JacketsThe Drop Blake Long Blazer ($72, originally $90) We can't get enough of TikTok's corpcore trend this season, and if you're looking for an easy way into the aesthetic, consider investing in a timeless blazer — just like this bestseller. The layer has an oversize silhouette that offers a more lived-in feel, with a wool and polyester composition that feels extra luxurious.PS Photography | India YaffeBest Amazon Prime Day Deals on JacketsOrolay Thickened Down Jacket ($90, originally $150) When a style earns the title of "the Amazon coat," then you know it's the real deal. This Orolay coat has thousands of five-star ratings on Amazon's site, with users raving about everything from its warm, down design and flattering structure to the style's fleece-lined hood, which provides extra warmth and protection from wind. See what makes this coat so great in our review of the Orolay Thickened Down Jacket. Editor Quote: "If it wasn't abundantly clear, you should buy this coat. It will get you through this season the way only a great coat can, and you'll find yourself being irrationally excited and proud of it, like I am. The coat comes in 10 colors, with six matte options and four new shiny options, and fits pretty true to size. I go between a small and a medium, but usually buy medium coats. I took the medium in this style, and it's slightly oversize but in a good way; I'm happy I didn't go with the small. The style also features two side zippers that can make it tighter or looser." — India Yaffe, former associate editor, Shoppingamazon.comBest Amazon Prime Day Deals on BottomsExlura High-Waist Polka Dot Pleated Skirt ($27, originally $34) PSA: we found the most quintessential fall skirt and it just so happens to be on sale at Amazon's October Prime Day event. The pleated style — which boasts more than 19,000 ratings on Amazon's site — is made from a lightweight fabric that's perfect for wear in between seasons. Its deep side pockets add a practical flair, and the style's wide array of color options mean you can stock up on the piece in multiple prints. PS Photography | Marisa PetrarcaBest Amazon Prime Day Deals on BottomsBaleaf Fleece-Lined Leggings ($26, originally $50) Just because temperatures are cooling down, doesn't mean you have to give up on wearing leggings — at least not with these fleece-lined bottoms in your wardrobe. Unlike traditional workout leggings, this pant has a thermal design that helps to provide more insulation and keep your legs feeling toasty. One PS editor even said that the leggings "transformed" her wardrobe in this review of the Baleaf Fleece-Lined Leggings. Editor Quote: "The Baleaf Fleece-Lined Leggings are best for people who love wearing leggings year-round, but are in need of a more heavy-duty pair for when temperatures plummet. They're cozy, yet sleek, proving you don't have to compromise on style for warmth. Not to mention, they prioritize practicality with two types of pockets to store all your small, on-person essentials." — Marisa Petrarca, contributing editor, Shoppingamazon.comBest Amazon Prime Day Deals on ShoesHomeTop Fuzzy Memory Foam Slippers ($15, originally $31) Nothing signifies the beginning of cozy season quite like buying a new pair of slippers. We have our eyes on this fuzzy pair, which — per Amazon reviewers — feels so luxurious, despite having an under-$20 price tag. Unlike other slippers, these shoes are machine washable and easy to keep clean, making them a wardrobe staple.amazon.comBest Amazon Prime Day Deals on ShoesAmazon Essentials Belice Ballet Flat ($16, originally $22) Tap into fall's balletcore trend with these sweet flats from Amazon. Built like a traditional ballet flat but with a more modern (and comfortable!) design, these shoes are a bestseller on the retailer's site — with more than 48,000 five-star reviews and an average 4.3 rating.amazon.comBest Amazon Prime Day Deals on ShoesNew Balance Women's 515 V3 Sneaker ($61, originally $75) There's no better time to stock up on cool everyday sneakers than during Amazon's October Prime Day sale — where many styles are now discounted. We currently have our eyes on this neutral New Balance shoe, which reviewers love for its cushiony midsole, adjustable laces, and elevated design.amazon.comBest Amazon Prime Day Deals on ShoesDr. Martens Carlson Mule ($80, originally $110) Dr. Martens might have a reputation for its iconic boots, but make no mistake — the brand has no shortage of cute clogs and mules too, as evidenced by this stylish slip-on pair. With a suede outer material, this shoe just screams fall. Plus, it's fitted with a comfortable insole that provides ample support for your feet.amazon.comBest Amazon Prime Day Deals on AccessoriesVsiopy Matte Square Claw Clips ($5, originally $6) In our experience, we've found that you can never have too many hair clips. Luckily, this bundle comes with six square options, all in different neutral colorways. Per the brand, these hair accessories are designed with all hair types in mind, including curly, straight, and wavy.amazon.comBest Amazon Prime Day Deals on AccessoriesFurtalk Beanie Hat ($9, originally $26) No winter wardrobe is complete without a staple beanie, and this cuffed style will be your go-to all season long. It's made from an acrylic, ribbed-knit material that'll help to insulate heat and keep your scalp warm through even the chilliest temperatures. And if the orange coloring isn't your preferred shade, the winter accessory is also available in white, black, and purple colorways.amazon.comBest Amazon Prime Day Deals on AccessoriesRay-Ban Rb3735 Bain Bridge Aviator Sunglasses ($177, originally $230) For a timeless style that you can wear for years to come, go for these retro aviator sunglasses from Ray-Ban. They're equal parts stylish and functional, with protective lenses that help to shield eyes from harmful UV rays. Learn more about this statement accessory in our Ray-Ban Aviator Sunglasses review. Editor Quote: "These are the sunglasses that look good on everyone for every occasion. They're polarized, so they actually protect from the sun, and they manage to be both sporty and polished. I wear them to work out, to run errands, to go out to eat, you name it, and they always look good. They're never out of place, and plus, I've never met someone who looks bad in them." — India Yaffe, former associate editor, Shoppingamazon.comBest Amazon Prime Day Deals on IntimatesVoenxe Seamless Underwear Thongs ($10, originally $13) Beyond adorable fashion finds, Amazon is also home to a great assortment of intimates and wardrobe essentials — as evidenced by this underwear bundle. These breathable thongs are touted as a bestseller, with over 51,000 five-star reviews that rave about everything from their breathability and stretchiness to the underwear's universally flattering design.PS Photography | Alessia SantoroBest Amazon Prime Day Deals on IntimatesCalvin Klein Modern Cotton Unlined Wireless Bralette ($18, originally $30) Leave it to Calvin Klein to create the perfect everyday bra with this wireless style. The sporty bralette is equal parts delicate and durable, with a lightweight design that's not too constricting, but still thick enough to provide ample support up top. Check out the full product details in our review of the Calvin Klein bralette. Editor Quote: "It's been approximately four glorious months since I embarked on this bralette journey (time truly flies when your bosom feels liberated). Since then, my collection has grown to include two more (white and gray because neutrals are life). I haven't missed a single day without donning one of them – except for one unfortunate occasion when I needed a strapless style. Let me tell you, as soon as I clasped myself into that restrictive contraption, I wanted to burst into tears. If you're anything like me, the moment of freedom that comes from swinging your bra over your head like a lasso after enduring hours of confinement is simply unparalleled." — Alessia Santoro, senior editor, SEOKyley Warren is an award-winning writer, editor, and affiliate strategist with more than four years of experience in the publishing space. She currently works as an assistant editor on PS Shopping and is an expert on all things related to shopping and fashion. She previously worked with Entertainment Tonight as a style commerce writer, and her byline has appeared in publications globally.
html:
While each product featured is independently selected by our editors, we may include paid promotion. If you buy something through our links, we may earn commission. Read more about our Product Review Guidelines here.

ICYMI: the final day of Amazon's October Prime Day sale is happenig for just a few more hours, which means now's your last chance to stock up on some of Amazon's most coveted styles at a fraction of their usual cost. From cozy sweaters and staple winter coats to celebrity-loved UGG boots and editor-approved dupes, there's something for everyone to shop — and just in time for the upcoming holiday gifting season. Ahead, we narrowed down the best October Prime Day fashion deals from day two of the massive event, with savings from major fashion brands like Levi's, Adidas, and Ray-Ban, among many others.

Our Favorite Amazon Prime Day Fashion Deals to Shop

  • You need this in every color: Mangopop Square-Neck Bodysuit at $17, originally $36
  • Cozy leggings for the cozy season: Baleaf Fleece-Lined Leggings at $26, originally $50
  • The best deal on Ray-Ban Aviators: Ray-Ban Aviator Sunglasses at $184, originally $230
  • You'll never want to take this bra off: Calvin Klein Cotton Wireless Bralette at $18, originally $30

Keep scrolling to shop our top picks, and if you're looking for more sales, check out PS's editor-curated Amazon Prime Day deals list and subscribe to our newsletter for more shopping recommendations. Plus, be sure to sign up for Amazon Prime so that you don't miss a second of the action.

Update on October 9, 2024 at 9:15PM ET: Updated prices and checked stock for all products.

Best Amazon Prime Day Deals on Bestsellers

14K Gold Hoop Earrings ($9, originally $12)

With this earring set, you can upgrade your jewelry box on a budget. The bundle comes with six pairs of gold hoop earrings, all of which boast different shapes, sizes, and even textures. You can scoop it up for yourself or gift it to the fashion-lover in your life.

Best Amazon Prime Day Deals on Bestsellers

Telena Belt Bag ($10, originally $13)

Found: the perfect bag for fall. This sporty accessory has developed a cult fan base thanks to its lightweight and practical design, which includes an adjustable strap and several zippered pockets. It's a perfect dupe for other luxe versions and comes in a variety of colorways, so you can shop out your dream style with ease. For the full product details, check out our review of the Telena Belt Bag.

Editor Quote: "The bag comes with many of the same features as the original viral belt bag, including ample storage and water-resistant material. It has a main compartment and three mesh slots for keeping valuables secure, plus adjustable straps that allow you to wear it as a crossbody, a belt bag, or a fanny pack. It's available in a whopping 32 different colorways, along with sherpa, puffer, and quilted textures, but we especially love the pink and beige options." — Lauren Mazzo, former senior editor, Fitness

Best Amazon Prime Day Deals on Bestsellers

Mangopop Square Neck Bodysuit ($17, originally $36)

Get back to the basics with this bestselling Amazon bodysuit — aka the ultimate wardrobe essential. This is a piece with so much styling versatility; you can wear it on its own, pair it with a blazer and jeans, or even a high-waisted skirt and boots for the breeziest fall 'fit. See how one editor styled the bodysuit in our review of Amazon's bestselling bodysuits.

Editor Quote: "The elasticity is flawless and makes for the most perfect fit. It's tight and form-fitting but hugs in all the right places. I love the square neckline, and the long sleeves make it the perfect pairing with jeans for fall. This bodysuit looks extremely similar to a bodysuit I've been eyeing that costs over $100, which makes me so happy I stumbled across this one because it's a fraction of the price." — Renee Rodriguez, staff writer and social producer

Best Amazon Prime Day Deals on Bestsellers

Beaully Flannel Plaid Shacket ($28, originally $46)

When the outside temperatures are too cold for a light knit, but still too warm for a heavy jacket, opt for a transitional piece like this stylish shacket. The layer combines the cozy feel of a classic jacket with the lightweight nature of a button-down, creating a versatile piece you can comfortably wear all season long. Plus, nothing says autumn quite like a new flannel.

Best Amazon Prime Day Deals on Bestsellers

Levi's Ribcage Straight Ankle Jeans ($31, originally $80)

You can never have too many pairs of jeans, and this Levi's style comes highly recommended — by Amazon shoppers and PS editors alike. The bottom's high-rise silhouette delivers a universally flattering fit that's designed to look good on a range of body types. Plus, it's breathable with semi-stretch, so you can move around with ease. Read through our Levi's Ribcage Straight Ankle Jeans review to learn more.

Editor Quote: "The Levi's Ribcage Straight Ankle Jeans are best for those looking for straight-leg denim that fuses comfort with classic style. While they're not cheap, Levi's is a reliable brand that prioritizes durability, so you can rest assured that they'll last you a long time. They're a great pair of jeans to add to your capsule collection." — Marisa Petrarca, contributing editor, Shopping

Best Amazon Prime Day Deals on Bestsellers

Koolaburra by UGG Victoria Mini Fashion Boot ($80, originally $90)

If you've been looking for an excuse to splurge on a new pair of UGG boots, look no further than this cropped style — which is currently on sale at October Prime Day. The mini boot is wrapped in the coziest suede material that's easy to keep clean, with a decorative faux-fur accent that helps it to stand out.

Best Amazon Prime Day Deals on Tops and Sweaters

Trendy Queen Off-the-Shoulder Top ($15, originally $20)

The asymmetrical top trend is here to stay, and with this sleek option, you can embrace the lopsided fad without having to break the bank. Pair it with high-waisted jeans and statement booties for the ultimate summer-to-fall look.

Best Amazon Prime Day Deals on Tops and Sweaters

Anrabess Oversized Crewneck Sweater ($30, originally $40)

There are cute fall sweaters, and then there's this chunky Amazon crewneck. From the oversize silhouette and cuffed sleeves to its cozy camel coloring and flattering design, there's so much to love about this cozy piece — including that discounted price tag.

Best Amazon Prime Day Deals on Dresses and Matching Sets

Qinsen Spaghetti Strap Tennis Dress ($31, originally $37)

Tap into the tenniscore trend with an athletic dress you can comfortably wear for your next workout or sweat sesh. The lightweight style is made from a nylon and elastane material that's sleek and moisture-wicking, so you won't have to worry about awkward sweat stains.

Best Amazon Prime Day Deals on Dresses and Matching Sets

Anrabess Oversized Sweater Dress ($34, originally $63)

What better way to welcome cozy season than with a new sweater dress you'll want to snuggle up in all season long? This ribbed style has an oversize design that creates a more lived-in feel, making it perfect for all-day lounging or any occasion where you want to prioritize comfort. We love the styling versatility of this white shade, but the fall dress is also available in 17 other colors.

Best Amazon Prime Day Deals on Dresses and Matching Sets

Anrabess 2-Piece Sweatsuit ($37, originally $50)

Slip into something a little more comfortable (and cohesive) with this matching sweatsuit from Amazon. The cozy bundle includes an oversize sweatshirt with adjustable sweatpants to match. You can wear the ensemble while lounging around at home, grabbing groceries, or even a quick bite to eat. It has a knit composition that's endlessly comfy, with extra stretch at the waist for easier movement.

Best Amazon Prime Day Deals on Jackets

The Drop Blake Long Blazer ($72, originally $90)

We can't get enough of TikTok's corpcore trend this season, and if you're looking for an easy way into the aesthetic, consider investing in a timeless blazer — just like this bestseller. The layer has an oversize silhouette that offers a more lived-in feel, with a wool and polyester composition that feels extra luxurious.

Best Amazon Prime Day Deals on Jackets

Orolay Thickened Down Jacket ($90, originally $150)

When a style earns the title of "the Amazon coat," then you know it's the real deal. This Orolay coat has thousands of five-star ratings on Amazon's site, with users raving about everything from its warm, down design and flattering structure to the style's fleece-lined hood, which provides extra warmth and protection from wind. See what makes this coat so great in our review of the Orolay Thickened Down Jacket.

Editor Quote: "If it wasn't abundantly clear, you should buy this coat. It will get you through this season the way only a great coat can, and you'll find yourself being irrationally excited and proud of it, like I am. The coat comes in 10 colors, with six matte options and four new shiny options, and fits pretty true to size. I go between a small and a medium, but usually buy medium coats. I took the medium in this style, and it's slightly oversize but in a good way; I'm happy I didn't go with the small. The style also features two side zippers that can make it tighter or looser." — India Yaffe, former associate editor, Shopping

Best Amazon Prime Day Deals on Bottoms

Exlura High-Waist Polka Dot Pleated Skirt ($27, originally $34)

PSA: we found the most quintessential fall skirt and it just so happens to be on sale at Amazon's October Prime Day event. The pleated style — which boasts more than 19,000 ratings on Amazon's site — is made from a lightweight fabric that's perfect for wear in between seasons. Its deep side pockets add a practical flair, and the style's wide array of color options mean you can stock up on the piece in multiple prints.

Best Amazon Prime Day Deals on Bottoms

Baleaf Fleece-Lined Leggings ($26, originally $50)

Just because temperatures are cooling down, doesn't mean you have to give up on wearing leggings — at least not with these fleece-lined bottoms in your wardrobe. Unlike traditional workout leggings, this pant has a thermal design that helps to provide more insulation and keep your legs feeling toasty. One PS editor even said that the leggings "transformed" her wardrobe in this review of the Baleaf Fleece-Lined Leggings.

Editor Quote: "The Baleaf Fleece-Lined Leggings are best for people who love wearing leggings year-round, but are in need of a more heavy-duty pair for when temperatures plummet. They're cozy, yet sleek, proving you don't have to compromise on style for warmth. Not to mention, they prioritize practicality with two types of pockets to store all your small, on-person essentials." — Marisa Petrarca, contributing editor, Shopping

Best Amazon Prime Day Deals on Shoes

HomeTop Fuzzy Memory Foam Slippers ($15, originally $31)

Nothing signifies the beginning of cozy season quite like buying a new pair of slippers. We have our eyes on this fuzzy pair, which — per Amazon reviewers — feels so luxurious, despite having an under-$20 price tag. Unlike other slippers, these shoes are machine washable and easy to keep clean, making them a wardrobe staple.

Best Amazon Prime Day Deals on Shoes

Amazon Essentials Belice Ballet Flat ($16, originally $22)

Tap into fall's balletcore trend with these sweet flats from Amazon. Built like a traditional ballet flat but with a more modern (and comfortable!) design, these shoes are a bestseller on the retailer's site — with more than 48,000 five-star reviews and an average 4.3 rating.

Best Amazon Prime Day Deals on Shoes

New Balance Women's 515 V3 Sneaker ($61, originally $75)

There's no better time to stock up on cool everyday sneakers than during Amazon's October Prime Day sale — where many styles are now discounted. We currently have our eyes on this neutral New Balance shoe, which reviewers love for its cushiony midsole, adjustable laces, and elevated design.

Best Amazon Prime Day Deals on Shoes

Dr. Martens Carlson Mule ($80, originally $110)

Dr. Martens might have a reputation for its iconic boots, but make no mistake — the brand has no shortage of cute clogs and mules too, as evidenced by this stylish slip-on pair. With a suede outer material, this shoe just screams fall. Plus, it's fitted with a comfortable insole that provides ample support for your feet.

Best Amazon Prime Day Deals on Accessories

Vsiopy Matte Square Claw Clips ($5, originally $6)

In our experience, we've found that you can never have too many hair clips. Luckily, this bundle comes with six square options, all in different neutral colorways. Per the brand, these hair accessories are designed with all hair types in mind, including curly, straight, and wavy.

Best Amazon Prime Day Deals on Accessories

Furtalk Beanie Hat ($9, originally $26)

No winter wardrobe is complete without a staple beanie, and this cuffed style will be your go-to all season long. It's made from an acrylic, ribbed-knit material that'll help to insulate heat and keep your scalp warm through even the chilliest temperatures. And if the orange coloring isn't your preferred shade, the winter accessory is also available in white, black, and purple colorways.

Best Amazon Prime Day Deals on Accessories

Ray-Ban Rb3735 Bain Bridge Aviator Sunglasses ($177, originally $230)

For a timeless style that you can wear for years to come, go for these retro aviator sunglasses from Ray-Ban. They're equal parts stylish and functional, with protective lenses that help to shield eyes from harmful UV rays. Learn more about this statement accessory in our Ray-Ban Aviator Sunglasses review.

Editor Quote: "These are the sunglasses that look good on everyone for every occasion. They're polarized, so they actually protect from the sun, and they manage to be both sporty and polished. I wear them to work out, to run errands, to go out to eat, you name it, and they always look good. They're never out of place, and plus, I've never met someone who looks bad in them." — India Yaffe, former associate editor, Shopping

Best Amazon Prime Day Deals on Intimates

Voenxe Seamless Underwear Thongs ($10, originally $13)

Beyond adorable fashion finds, Amazon is also home to a great assortment of intimates and wardrobe essentials — as evidenced by this underwear bundle. These breathable thongs are touted as a bestseller, with over 51,000 five-star reviews that rave about everything from their breathability and stretchiness to the underwear's universally flattering design.

Best Amazon Prime Day Deals on Intimates

Calvin Klein Modern Cotton Unlined Wireless Bralette ($18, originally $30)

Leave it to Calvin Klein to create the perfect everyday bra with this wireless style. The sporty bralette is equal parts delicate and durable, with a lightweight design that's not too constricting, but still thick enough to provide ample support up top. Check out the full product details in our review of the Calvin Klein bralette.

Editor Quote: "It's been approximately four glorious months since I embarked on this bralette journey (time truly flies when your bosom feels liberated). Since then, my collection has grown to include two more (white and gray because neutrals are life). I haven't missed a single day without donning one of them – except for one unfortunate occasion when I needed a strapless style. Let me tell you, as soon as I clasped myself into that restrictive contraption, I wanted to burst into tears. If you're anything like me, the moment of freedom that comes from swinging your bra over your head like a lasso after enduring hours of confinement is simply unparalleled." — Alessia Santoro, senior editor, SEO

Kyley Warren is an award-winning writer, editor, and affiliate strategist with more than four years of experience in the publishing space. She currently works as an assistant editor on PS Shopping and is an expert on all things related to shopping and fashion. She previously worked with Entertainment Tonight as a style commerce writer, and her byline has appeared in publications globally.
